client.domestic

Interface IDomesticTradeController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DomesticTradeController

    public interface IDomesticTradeController
extends IController
    Interface for the domestic trade controller

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptTrade(boolean willAccept)
      Called by the accept trade overlay when the user either accepts or rejects a trade.
      void cancelTrade()
      Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user cancels a trade.
      void decreaseResourceAmount(ResourceType resource)
      Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user decreases the amount of a resource.
      void increaseResourceAmount(ResourceType resource)
      Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user increases the amount of a resource.
      void sendTradeOffer()
      Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user clicks the trade button.
      void setPlayerToTradeWith(int playerIndex)
      Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user selects a player to trade with.
      void setResourceToReceive(ResourceType resource)
      Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user selects a resource to be received.
      void setResourceToSend(ResourceType resource)
      Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user selects a resource to be sent.
      void startTrade()
      Called by the domestic trade view when the user clicks the domestic trade button.
      void unsetResource(ResourceType resource)
      Called by the domestic trade overlay when user selects "none" for a resource.

      • Methods inherited from interface client.base.IController

        getView

    • Method Detail

      • startTrade

        void startTrade()
        Called by the domestic trade view when the user clicks the domestic trade button.

      • decreaseResourceAmount

        void decreaseResourceAmount(ResourceType resource)
        Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user decreases the amount of a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource whose amount is being decreased

      • increaseResourceAmount

        void increaseResourceAmount(ResourceType resource)
        Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user increases the amount of a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource whose amount is being increased

      • sendTradeOffer

        void sendTradeOffer()
        Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user clicks the trade button.

      • setPlayerToTradeWith

        void setPlayerToTradeWith(int playerIndex)
        Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user selects a player to trade with.
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index [0, 3] of the selected trading partner, or -1 if "None" was selected

      • setResourceToReceive

        void setResourceToReceive(ResourceType resource)
        Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user selects a resource to be received.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to be received

      • setResourceToSend

        void setResourceToSend(ResourceType resource)
        Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user selects a resource to be sent.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to be sent

      • unsetResource

        void unsetResource(ResourceType resource)
        Called by the domestic trade overlay when user selects "none" for a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource for which "none" was selected

      • cancelTrade

        void cancelTrade()
        Called by the domestic trade overlay when the user cancels a trade.

      • acceptTrade

        void acceptTrade(boolean willAccept)
        Called by the accept trade overlay when the user either accepts or rejects a trade.
        Parameters:
        willAccept - Whether or not the user accepted the trade
